name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen Lens - Search Screen with Google Lens

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search your screen with Google Lens in a single click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Screen Lens – Google Lens for PC

Screen Lens brings the power of Google Lens to your desktop. With one click, search your screen’s content—text, images, objects, and more—using Google Lens, without needing to upload anything.

Consider it the ‘circle to search’ feature, typically exclusive to Android phones, now available for your PC. Unlock the power of Google Lens to enhance your browsing experience and boost your productivity effortlessly.

Key Features:

1. Screen Search: Instantly search the entire content of your screen with Google Lens.

2. Search Area Feature: Select a specific area of your screen to capture and search, allowing for targeted queries.

3. Text Translation & Object Identification: Identify text, products, landmarks, and more.

4. Local Image Search: Easily search local images saved on your PC using Google Lens with the 'Local Search' button.

5. Right-Click Image Search: Right-click on any image on the web and select 'Search with Google Lens' from the context menu for quick access.

6. Keyboard Shortcut: Quickly search your screen content with Google Lens using keyboard shortcuts, without needing to open the extension. Press Alt+Q to instantly capture and search your full screen, or use Alt+W to select and search a specific area, allowing you to focus your search with ease and save time.

7. YouTube Frame Search: A search button near YouTube's toolbar, allows you to search the current video frame with Google Lens. This feature can be toggled on/off in the options page.

8. Privacy-Focused: No data is collected or stored. Everything happens locally.

Note: Some features of Screen Lens may not work in browsers like Opera, Arc and Vivaldi, which modify Chromium’s standard behavior and can override certain extension functionalities. Screen Lens works best with Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Brave.

Install Screen Lens and easily search what’s on your screen today!
